reviews.review_text: Rather dry history of Barcelona. Better than Robert Hughes "Barcelona: The Great Enchantress". If you are looking for an impressionist history of Barcelona..keep looking. There's nothing in either book.

title: Barcelona: A Thousand Years of the City's Past
word_cloud: rather dry history look impressionist history look nothing
summary: In this book, the author shows how Barcelona's story is mapped out in its artistic and architectural heritage, highlighting especially the identity crisis that it suffers as the first industrial and commercial city of Spain while being the capital of an independence-seeking Catalonia.
